subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: ESPN’s N.B.A. and college basketball commentators will switch roles during a Jan. 7 doubleheader. Mike Tirico and the analysts Mark Jackson and Jeff Van Gundy will call Davidson at Duke at 7 p.m. Eastern, followed by Dan Shulman and Dick Vitale providing commentary when the Denver Nuggets host the Miami Heat at 9 p.m. “It’s been over two decades since I’ve worked an N.B.A. game, but basketball is basketball at all levels and a free throw is still worth a point,” Vitale said.
